message:
For People like me! very useful! 

OneTab Chrome Extension lets you convert all of your tabs into a list available later, with one click. Useful. https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/onetab/chphlpgkkbolifaimnlloiipkdnihall?hl=en

data.message:
looks great n useful
thanks mohammed

Here's how you can do it without an extension (which takes memory) in 4 easy steps:
1. Switch to Firefox.
2. Check "Don't load tabs until selected"
3. Use "Group Your Tabs" to hide tabs that you won't need in this session.
4. Get yourself a coffee for the great work you've just done.
I like chrome, and I don't like coffee :D
Firefox is the most horrible browser, full of memory leaks. very serious problem in freeing the Ram. garbage collection is un-controllable I just hate using it:D
I guess it's safari that you use
Is that Firefox of 2002, ya Abo Adam? :D
